law.text: The power and duty to administer and enforce KRS 363.510 to 363.850 is vested in the Department of Agriculture, and shall be exercised under the supervision of the Office for Consumer and Environmental Protection through the Division of Regulation and Inspection. The division shall be headed by a director appointed by the Commissioner of Agriculture and shall have personnel as determined and appointed by the Commissioner.
law.history: Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 88, sec. 8, effective July 13, 2004. -- Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 49, sec. 25, effective July 15, 2002. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 393, sec. 5, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 264, sec. 6.
